de.businesscode.bcdui.wrs.load

Class Wrq2Sql

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.businesscode.bcdui.wrs.load.Wrq2Sql
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISqlGenerator

    public class Wrq2Sql
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISqlGenerator
    Takes a Wrq and generates SQL from it together with the bound variables, ready to be executed One instance of this class only handles one Wrq TODO Features Fix issue with dummy- bRef for wrq:C[wrq:Calc] Allow Pagination and TOP-N at the same time Allow wrq:Calc in order-by, grouping Allow @aggr=none and not wrq:Calc in top-n (for UDF), fails now because cannot be separated into non-aggr and aggr part
